lead_paragraph: The Maple Leafs are the center of attention, and the Raptors and the Blue Jays have recently made playoff runs. A championship for Toronto F.C. could change the story.

headline.print_headline: Toronto’s M.L.S. Team Pursues Title, and Relevance at Home
headline.main: Toronto F.C. Pursues a Title, and Relevance in Its Own City

snippet: The Maple Leafs are the center of attention, and the Raptors and the Blue Jays have recently made playoff runs. A championship for Toronto F.C. could change the story....
abstract: Toronto FC hopes to win more attention among local fans in city crowded with professional sports teams by beating Montreal in second leg of MLS Cup semifinal series; city last celebrated a major North American league title when Blue Jays won 1993 World Series.
